sentences.en: I mean, why doesn't anyone speak Sumerian anymore?
sentences.cn: 我想说, 为什么现在现在没人再说苏美尔语了?

sentences.en: So too the stories of Moses and of Samson have Sumerian and Babylonian parallels.
sentences.cn: 同样,关于摩西和参孙的传说在苏美尔和巴比伦也有相似的版本.

sentences.en: Sumerian myth , Hittites myth, a myth of their letters have a great impact.
sentences.cn: 苏美尔神话、赫梯神话 、 迦南神话对其都有巨大的影响.

sentences.en: Sumerian religion was polytheistic, that is, the Sumerians and worshipped many gods.
sentences.cn: 苏美人的宗教为多神教, 也就是, 苏美人奉信和膜拜很多神灵.

sentences.en: Sumerian religion was polytheistic, that is, the Sumerians believed in and worshipped many gods.
sentences.cn: 苏美尔人的宗教拾多神教, 也就是, 苏美尔人奉信和膜拜很多神灵.

sentences.en: Sumerian religion was squarely in this world.
sentences.cn: 苏美人的宗教横向影响了这个世界.

sentences.en: There are, however, massive brick pillars in Sumerian buildings at Ur and at Kish.
sentences.cn: 不过, 在乌尔和渴石的苏美尔人的建筑物中,有用砖砌成的粗大的柱子.
